org.modelio.metamodel.experts.links

Interface ILinkManipulator

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILinkTool
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinkTool

    public interface ILinkManipulator
    Link manipulation tools to get or set model link source and target.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MObject getSource(MObject aLink)
      Get a model link source

      Get a model link target.

      • setSource

        void setSource(MObject link,
             MObject oldSource,
             MObject newSource)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Change a model link source.
        Parameters:
        link - a model link.
        oldSource - the old source.
        newSource - the new source.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the new destination is illegal or the link is not a model link.

      • setTarget

        void setTarget(MObject link,
             MObject oldTarget,
             MObject newTarget)
               throws IllegalArgumentException
        Change a model link target.
        Parameters:
        link - a model link.
        oldTarget - the old target.
        newTarget - the new target.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the new destination is illegal or the link is not a model link.
